mapper.select: SELECT GD.DOCUMENT_KEY as id, GD.DOCUMENT_TITLE as text, GD.DOCUMENT_TEXT as content, GD.DIRECTORY_KEY as parent ,GDR.DIR_NAME as parentTitle FROM GUIDE_TAGGING as GT JOIN GUIDE_DOCUMENT as GD ON GT.DOCUMENT_KEY = GD.DOCUMENT_KEY JOIN GUIDE_DIR as GDR ON GDR.DIR_KEY = GD.DIRECTORY_KEY WHERE GT.TAG = #{tag} AND GD.DOCUMENT_STATE=1;
SELECT TAG as tag FROM GUIDE_TAGGING WHERE DOCUMENT_KEY = #{doc_key};
SELECT DISTINCT TAG as tag FROM GUIDE_TAGGING WHERE TAG LIKE CONCAT("%", #{tag}, "%");
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GUIDE_TAG WHERE TAG NOT IN ( SELECT TAG FROM GUIDE_TAGGING )
